text: Eassie railway station served the village of Eassie, Angus, Scotland from 1848 to 1956 on the Scottish Midland Junction Railway. == History == The station opened on 1 August 1848 by the Scottish Midland Junction Railway. The station was closed to both passengers and goods traffic on 11 June 1956. == References == == External links == Category:Disused railway stations in Angus Category:Former Caledonian Railway stations Category:Railway stations in Great Britain opened in 1848 Category:Railway stations in Great Britain closed in 1956 Category:1848 establishments in Scotland Category:1956 disestablishments in Scotland
title: Eassie railway station
